mapper.insert: insert into tr_queue_number (noticecode, vehicleno, RFID, queuenumber, waitingnumber) values (#{noticecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queuenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waitingnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tr_queue_number
noticecode,
vehicleno,
RFID,
queuenumber,
waitingnumber,
#{noticecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{queuenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{waitingnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update tr_queue_number
vehicleno = #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RFID = #{rfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
queuenumber = #{queuenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waitingnumber = #{waitingnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where noticecode = #{noticecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.queuenumber, t1.vehicleno, t5.`name` AS materialname, t5.packagetype AS materialpk, t3.customername, t6.entertime FROM tr_queue_number t1 LEFT JOIN tr_sales_db_arrive t2 ON t1.noticecode = t2.`code` LEFT JOIN tr_sales_db_application t3 ON t2.billid = t3.id LEFT JOIN tr_sales_db_application_detail t4 ON t2.billdetailid = t4.id LEFT JOIN tr_materiel_db_manage t5 ON t4.materielid = t5.id LEFT JOIN tr_access_db_record t6 ON t2.id = t6.noticeid WHERE t2.`status` IN (1, 7) AND t5.packagetype = 1
